data.title: Continuing Professional Development Portal
data.description: This web application was designed to have a separate portal for the accredited CPD Programs, make it convenient for the Providers to apply for accreditation to PRC, and reduce the time it takes to complete certification applications. Aside from the Provider Portal, I have also designed an Administrator Portal to speed up the process of evaluating a program accreditation. There's also the Consumer Portal for the Professionals to view and access accredited providers and programs. They can also use the system to view all programs they are enrolled in, hassle free online payment, and easy management of all certificates once all programs are completed

data.title: e-Payment System Portal
data.description: A proposed system portal pursuant to the Ease of Doing Business and Efficient Government Services Delivery Act of 2018 (Republic Act No. 8792), commonly known as the E-Commerce Act of 2000 and RA 11032 that requires all offices and agencies to upgrade their transaction systems and procedures.BUREAU OF CUSTOMS (PROPOSED SOLUTION)

data.title: Vaccination Registration Portal
data.description: The system is developed in order to facilitate registration for the COVID-19 Vaccination Program for the residents of Calamba Laguna during the pandemic. This will help the City Health Office plan and organize the rollout of the COVID-19 vaccine.

data.title: Vaccination Registration Portal
data.description: The system is designed in order to facilitate registration for the COVID-19 Vaccination Program for the residents of Calamba Laguna during the pandemic. This will help the City Health Office plan and organize the rollout of the COVID-19 vaccine.

data.title: Human Resource Information System / Property Information and Management System
data.description: Designed for GCG that aims to monitor the status and processes to ensure the easy management of human resources, business processes, and data.

data.title: Employees Compensation Payroll System and Personnel Management Information System
data.description: The project is for an integrated solution that will facilitate a more efficient flow and work procedure for the human resource management department. The implementation includes the following project with specifications gathered from different resources from each division: System Administration Module, Employee Self-Service Module, Job Management Module (pre-qualifying of applicants), Recruitment Module, Personnel Information Management Module, Attendance and Leave Credit Module, Payroll Management System, and Reports Module.

data.title: Payment Portal
data.description: An online payment facility for those who need to register and renew their guns and apply for a License to Own and Possess Firearms (LTOPF).
data.extra: PHILIPPINE NATIONAL POLICE - FIREAMS EXPLOSIVES OFFICE)

data.title: Ease of Doing Business - SmartJuan24
data.description: SmartJuan24 is a fully automated business registration in Dolores Quezon. It expedites new and renewal of business permit, online payment of application fees and automated approval of new and renewal application. It aims to streamline the current systems and procedures of government services as mandated under ARTA Law (Anti Red Tape Act), so they need to automate business-related transactions.

data.title: Facebook Chatbot Application
data.description: An automated messaging tool that communicates with users by using automated responses. It lives within Facebook Messenger. The chatbot has an Administrator Console that allows uesrs to improve the chatbot without having to write any code. It can also be used to improve overall audience engagement and generate leads.
data.extra: BMW PHILIPPINES AND GOV. UMALI OF PROVINCE OF NUEVA ECIJA (LIVE)

data.title: Campus Management System
data.description: Designed for MSU Campus to automate and simplify the administrative task, allowing the academic administrators and professors save time, eliminate simple and monotonous task, improve efficiency, prevent or reduce errors on records and faster query and reporting.

data.title: Chizmis - Social Media Application
data.description: Connect, Socialize and Shop. This system is developed for a private company as a test application to study and develop a different social media space

data.title: Digital ERP
data.description: Digital ERP includes University Information System, Human Resource Information System and Learning Management System.

data.title: Hospital Management System
data.description: The system aims to keep track of medical records, inventory management, patientsâ€™ data information, appointment booking and streamline the administrative processses in hospitals.

data.title: Unlad e-Commerce
data.description: Designed for Unified Livelihood And Development Initiative (UNLAD) that aims to increase sales. The objective is to bring products closer to shoppers by strengthening its digital services. The system also includes Administrator portal
